The museum is located near some of the most intense of the mass anti-government protests sweeping the capital, and Egyptian army commandoes secured the building and its grounds early Saturday morning. They managed to stop them, Zahi Hawass said. He added that the would-be looters only vandalized two mummies, ripping their heads off. They also cleared out the museum gift shop. While there weren't any stunning new features added to the PS2 and Xbox games, tweaks were added to improve the existing features. The theme for 07 is`` Turn the Tide. Like the 2005 version said for home-field advantage, this year's version emphasizes that momentum is more important in college football than any other sport.
